Today in Donegal, it's looking solid with 6 ft @ 8s N swell and fresh 14 mph N winds. Pollan Bay and Ballyheiran Bay are your best bets, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 5s WNW with fresh 14 mph SW winds, making for some workable waves at Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand. On the day after, conditions improve with 3 ft @ 8s WNW and lighter 6 mph NW winds, perfect for a fun session at Mullaghmore Strand. Best: today.
